blocks.question: Good afternoon! Do you have a reservation with us?
options: Yes, I have one reservation with you.
Yes, I have a reservation under my name.

blocks.question: May I see your ID and a credit card, please?
options: Yes, I go show my documents now.
Sure, here are my ID and credit card.

blocks.question: Would you like help with your luggage?
options: No need, I take the bag alone.
No, I can carry it myself, thank you.

blocks.question: Your room is ready. Would you like one key or two?
options: I want two keys because my friend come later.
Two keys, please. My friend will come later.

blocks.question: Breakfast is served from 7 to 10 AM in the dining room.
options: Okay, I go eat before ten hours.
Thank you! I’ll have breakfast before 10.

blocks.question: Do you need a wake-up call in the morning?
options: Yes, could you wake me up at 6 AM?

blocks.question: If you need anything, just dial 0 from your room.
options: Thanks, if I need I call for you.
Thank you, I’ll call if I need anything.

blocks.question: How was your stay with us?
options: It was good, I like very much the room.
It was very nice, the room was great.

blocks.question: We hope to see you again soon!
options: Thanks, I go back in other day.
Thank you! I’ll come back another day.
